Author: Keinoshi
Description:
A CBA 6X tech mod adapted from Motz144's CBA 6X Gunpowder mod.

This mod is the

version (less frequent updates). To play the latest version, please download the mod below:
https://www.ageofempires.com/mods/details/60487/

If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions, please let me know via the form below:

>https://www.facebook.com/groups/1539230549932375

Credits:
Original mod by Motz144.
Data mod recreated for the India DLC by Blizz and modified by Keinoshi.
Data mod recreated for the Rome DLC by Keinoshi.
Map updated by Keinoshi.
Title: 6X Tech CBA Rome DLC
